entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:29 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain or snow. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High 6. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 11. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
